desc.name: Worked on E-commerce site for India's leading automobile industry. Built with enhanced optimization.
Worked on Data Analysis | Data Visualization based on business & client requirements.
Got Hands-on training in Hadoop | Spark with AWS and Worked on a Data-Migration project.
Worked on Data Management Project from gathering Data, Preparation, Analysis , ETL and Visualization
Worked on ML-POC on open-source dataset, to check whether diabetic patients will be readmitted or not.
Joined for Sales & Marketing Position. Later due to requirements, I learnt SQL and worked as a SQL-Developer.
Maintain customers and clients database, writing SQL scripts, performing scd's in sql-server.
I also co-ordinated with other team to sell and service RO water purifiers and Electronic products
